## Pre-Install Libraries

Hello Professor Sebastian,

Please run the following chunk of script, this will pre-install all the libraries that are necessary, and the libraries that are already in your computer will be skipped.

Note: Please set your Session in Applied_Statistics_R_exercises/ the script take care absolute paths.

Thanks

Aldair Leon

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source('scripts/install_libraries.r', chdir = TRUE)
install_libraries()
```
